definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升为经销处副总经理，我心里特别高兴。

sentences.english: The boss promoted him to the post of chief accountant.
sentences.chinese: 老板提升他为会计室主任。

sentences.english: The glycemic index ranks foods based on how much they raise blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 血糖指数衡量食物提升血糖的速度。

sentences.english: Make a self-development plan to acquire the skills and experiences you need.
sentences.chinese: 制定一个获取技能和经验的自我提升计划。

sentences.english: After soil improvement, the yield of this land has increased greatly.
sentences.chinese: 改土后，这块地的产量大幅提升。

sentences.english: Strategic communication plays an important role in the implementation of its corporate strategy.
sentences.chinese: 战略沟通在提升企业战略执行力中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: Love and knowledge, so far as they were possible, led me upward toward the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 爱和知识可能地把我向天堂提升。

sentences.english: What kind of free-gift will raise your purchasing desire?
sentences.chinese: 甚么类型的免费赠品会提升你的购买意欲？

sentences.english: What is heterogeneous batching and how can it help performance?
sentences.chinese: 何为异构批处理且它如何有助于性能提升？

sentences.english: Danburite is also useful in the repair of the will centers in ascension.
sentences.chinese: 赛黄晶在提升中对意愿中心的修复也有帮助。

sentences.english: FXP: Fighting Experience allows you to level up.
sentences.chinese: 战斗经验可以让您级别提升。

sentences.english: Advocacy of law-breaking heightens it still further.
sentences.chinese: 鼓吹违法行为更有助于提升这种可能性。

sentences.english: Henrik Westberg is a gifted healer of ascension.
sentences.chinese: 是一名出色的提升疗愈者。

sentences.english: The point of goal-setting is to improve the quality of the present.
sentences.chinese: 设定目标的关键点是提升你此刻处理事务的质量。

sentences.english: Develop students' professional knowledge and the ability of self-expression, communication, and collaboration in teamwork.
sentences.chinese: 著重团队合作学习，提升表达及沟通能力。

sentences.english: Hoister running smooth, it can be upgraded to reach a higher height.
sentences.chinese: 提升机运行平稳，因此可达到较高的提升高度。

definition: to escalate (in intensity)/to go up by one grade/to be promoted/to upgrade (computing)
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
